Package leitej.crypto.symmetric

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CircBinary  
    CircBlockCipher
    Segmented Integer Counter - Input Rotate - Partial Block Chaining (SICIRPBC) or Counter Input Rotate Chaining (CIRC)
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CipherEnum  
    ModeEnum  
    PaddingEnum  
    PBEEnum
    Password-based encryption (PBE).

    PBE mechanisms are based on cryptographic hashing mechanisms.
    PBEEnum.IterationCountEnum
    Iteration count is a public value - as in you should assume an attacker can find it.

    The sole purpose of the iteration count is to increase the computation time required to convert a password to a key.
    StreamCipherEnum
    Stream ciphers do not have modes or require padding, they will always produce output the same length as the input.
    The idea is for the cipher to create a stream of bits that are then XORed with the plain-text to produce the cipher-text.
    Stream ciphers are basically just ciphers that, by design, behave like block ciphers using the streaming modes.
